metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the linux-def:slackwarepkginfo_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the linux-def:slackwarepkginfo_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the slackwarepkginfo_object is supported with the name entity equal to some value.
Test that the slackwarepkginfo_object is supported with the name entity not equal to some value.
Test that the slackwarepkginfo_object is supported with the name entity matching some regular expression.

slackwarepkginfo_test.comment: Test that the slackwarepkginfo_object is supported with the name entity equal to some value.
Test that the slackwarepkginfo_object is supported with the name entity not equal to some value.
Test that the slackwarepkginfo_object is supported with the name entity matching some regular expression.

slackwarepkginfo_object.comment: Retrieve an slackwarepkginfo_item with a name equal to 'pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2'.
slackwarepkginfo_object.name: pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2

slackwarepkginfo_object.comment: Retrieve slackwarepkginfo_items with names that are not equal to 'pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2'.
slackwarepkginfo_object.name: pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2

slackwarepkginfo_object.comment: Retrieve slackwarepkginfo_items with names that match the regular expression '^pkgtools-[0-9.]{4}-[a-z]{6}-2$'.
slackwarepkginfo_object.name: ^pkgtools-[0-9.]{4}-[a-z]{6}-2$

slackwarepkginfo_state.comment: This state represents an slackwarepkginfo_item that has a name equal to 'pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2', and a version, architecture, and revision that match the regular expression '.*'.
slackwarepkginfo_state.name: pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2

slackwarepkginfo_state.comment: This state represents slackwarepkginfo_items that have a name not equal to 'pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2', and a version, architecture, and revision that match the regular expression '.*'.
slackwarepkginfo_state.name: pkgtools-13.0-noarch-2

slackwarepkginfo_state.comment: This state represents slackwarepkginfo_items that have a name that matches the regular expression '^pkgtools-[0-9.]{4}-[a-z]{6}-2$', and a version, architecture, and revision that match the regular expression '.*'.
slackwarepkginfo_state.name: ^pkgtools-[0-9.]{4}-[a-z]{6}-2$
